name: Alonn in the World of Nowhere
name_original: Alonn in the World of Nowhere
description:
Take the control of Alonn, a simple guy who was just going to work on an ordinary day when he fell into an open manhole and ended up in this world of nowhere.

Now he needs to explore this ever new forest full of danger, in hopes of, somehow, find a way to go back to his own world and explain to his boss why he got late to work!
